contentrichtext.text: '''Arad''' or '''ARAD''' may refer to: {{TOCRight}} ==People== * [[Arad (surname)]] ==Places== ===Places in Bahrain=== * [[Arad, Bahrain]], a village in Al Muharraq Governorate * [[Arad Fort]], located on Arad shore, Bahrain ===Places in Israel=== * [[Arad, Israel]], a city * [[Tel Arad]], the remains of the ancient city of Arad ===Places in Iran=== * [[Arad, Iran]], a city in Fars Province, Iran * [[Arad, Tehran]], a village in Tehran Province, Iran * [[Arad District]], an administrative subdivision of Fars Province * [[Arad General Hospital]] in Tehran, Iran ===Places in Romania=== * [[Arad, Romania]], the main city of Arad County ** [[The 13 Martyrs of Arad]], 19th century generals who were executed in Arad, then part of Hungary * [[Arad County]], at the western edge of Transylvania (CriÅŸana-Banat), Romania * [[Arad County (former)]], a historical county of Austro-Hungarian Empire, and later [[Kingdom of Romania]] {{disambig|geo}}
